text: God wants us to prosper financially, to have plenty of money, to fulfill the destiny He has laid out for us.
author: Joel Osteen

text: I try to treat all the money I'm making like it's the last time I'm going to make it.
author: Eminem

text: Money is not required to buy one necessity of the soul.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Don't matter how much money you got, there's only two kinds of people: there's saved people and there's lost people.
author: Bob Dylan

text: Because parents have power over children. They feel they have to do what their parents say. But the love of money is the root of all evil. And this is a sweet child. And to see him turn like this, this isn't him. This is not him.
author: Michael Jackson
